title: Vehicle Diagnostic Application for High-Voltage Battery Assessment
description: Development of a vehicle diagnostic application for assessing high-voltage batteries in electric vehicles.

title: Patient and Blood Data Management Application
description: Implementation of an application for managing patients and blood data for algorithms determining various disease risks.

title: Vehicle Diagnostic Application for Experts and Inspection Organizations
description: Further development of a vehicle diagnostic application for experts and inspection organizations. Renewal of the technology stack and transformation.

title: Emergency Management Application for Emergency Call Centers
description: Implementation of an application for emergency management in emergency call centers.

title: New Diagnostic Software Platform
description: Development of a new diagnostic software platform.

title: Vehicle Diagnostic Content Management in AUTOSAR
description: Further development of applications for managing vehicle diagnostic content in AUTOSAR.

title: Diagnostic Software Platform Development
description: Development of a new diagnostic software platform.

title: Application Framework for System Integration
description: Development of an application framework for integrating various systems (vehicle diagnostics, guided troubleshooting, CMS, 3D navigation, etc.) and their semantic linking/embedding.

title: Vehicle Data Information System
description: Development of a web application as an information system for vehicle data (repair instructions, wiring diagrams, etc.).

title: Software Internationalization Components
description: Development of components for software internationalization.

title: IDE for Formal Vehicle Communication Description
description: Development of an IDE for formal description of vehicle communication (based on ODX) and offboard test processes (based on OTX).

title: Vehicle Diagnostic Device Communication Application
description: OSGi application for communication with vehicle diagnostic devices. Tooling environment for DSL-based creation of communication functions.

title: MDA with Eclipse Training
description: Training on Model Driven Architecture with Eclipse. Introduction to Model Driven Software Development techniques based on Eclipse. Training on Eclipse MDA tools: EMF, Xpand, Xtend, Xtext, MWE. Support in abstracting company-internal models.

title: Eclipse Plugins for BPM-Based Software Generation
description: Eclipse plugins for software generation based on BPM processes. Integration into JDT, adaptation of Groovy. MDSD generation approach for exporting plugin artifacts.

title: Seminar Management System Database Layer
description: Implementation of the database layer for a seminar management system. Generation of DAO and service layers with EMF and Xpand.

title: Medical Device Configuration Application
description: Eclipse application for configuring a medical device. USB communication, Eclipse RAP, and BIRT integration for data visualization.

title: Offer Information Management Web Application
description: Web application for managing offer information. Coaching the development team in Bucharest, Romania on Eclipse and OSGi. Communication between Romania and Germany.

title: Environmental Information Management System
description: Management system for environmentally relevant information. Software architecture and framework development. Coaching the development team. Technology consulting.

title: Content Management System Configuration Tool
description: Management tool for configuring a content management system. Coaching the development team. Technology consulting.

title: Offline Knowledge Base Client for Medical Device Service Technicians
description: Offline client for researching a knowledge base for medical device service technicians. Design and implementation of an RCP application. Focus on data security, SmartCard authentication, PKCS#11. Search through local datasets with ranking. Synchronization of local data with online inventory.
role: Technical Project Lead, System Architect, Developer

title: E-Learning Platform with Offline Client
description: E-learning platform with an offline client for executing Flash/HTML e-learnings. Offline SCORM interface via XUL. Modular installation, updating, and uninstallation of learning content. Learning progress tracking with Learning Management System (LMS).

title: Eclipse RCP Technology Consulting
description: Technology consulting for Eclipse RCP, know-how transfer. Coaching offshore development team (porting Swing to SWT).

title: PowerPoint Management System for Sales Representatives
description: PowerPoint management system for sales representatives. Distribution tool for PowerPoint presentations. Modular installation, updating, and uninstallation of PowerPoint sets. Communication with PowerPoint and synchronization of meta information between Eclipse client and PowerPoint (via PPT Add-In). Server application for managing available slide sets. SWT visualization component for PowerPoint on 16:9 trade show computers.
role: Technical Project Lead, System Architect, Developer

title: E-Learning Platform
description: E-learning platform with an offline client for executing Flash/HTML e-learnings. Modular installation, updating, and uninstallation of learning content.

title: RCP Application Test System for SAP Process Configuration
description: Test system for a complex RCP application for SAP process configuration. Mapping requirement keys from specification to unit tests. Implementation of JUnit tests, Eclipse UI testing on JUnit basis. Build system for RCP application and test execution.

title: Medical Image Transfer Client
description: Client for transferring medical images via SFTP and modification of DICOM attributes during upload.

title: Archived Book Series Management Application
description: Client application for managing archived book series. PDF management including search functionality. Designed to run from a read-only medium (DVD).
role: Technical Project Lead, System Architect, Developer

title: Medical Device Control Software
description: Control software for a medical device. System architecture and coaching of the development team.

title: Offline Opportunity Management Client
description: Offline client for opportunity management for sales representatives.

title: Employee Evaluation Reporting Integration
description: Reporting integration for a web application for employee evaluation.

title: Postal Delivery Certificate Management Application
description: Implementation of an application for managing postal delivery certificates. Automated letter photography.

title: Livelink Frontend UI Component Development
description: UI component development for a Livelink frontend.

title: SAP Order System Configuration Management Software
description: Management software for configuring and creating program routines of a SAP order system. Implementation of UI, data management, and graphical process editors. Specification.
role: Technical Project Lead, System Architect, Developer
